name: sequenzia-claude-plugins
description: Directory of popular Claude Code extensions including development tools, productivity plugins, and MCP integrations

plugins.name: prd-generator
plugins.description: A plugin for creating and managing PRDs (Product Requirement Documents)

plugins.name: feature-dev
plugins.description: Comprehensive feature development workflow with specialized agents for codebase exploration, architecture design, and quality review

plugins.name: spec-task-manager
plugins.description: A plugin for creating and managing tasks from specifications

plugins.name: ralph-task-executor
plugins.description: Automated task execution engine integrating spec-task-manager with ralph-loop for continuous development workflows
